               throws ValueException,
                      java.lang.NullPointerException
        Inserts the given element in the tree. Duplicate elements are not allowed.
        Parameters:
        elem - the given element
        Returns:
        true if insertion was successful, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        ValueException - if the element is not comparable to the root node
        java.lang.NullPointerException

      • find

        public E find(E key)
                                       throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                              ValueException
        Searches for the (first) element with the given key. Returns true if it could be found, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        key - element we are looking for
        Returns:
        true if the element was found
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the key is null
        ValueException - if the key is not comparable to the root node

      • remove

        public boolean remove(E key)
               throws ValueException,
                      java.lang.NullPointerException
        Removes the (first) element with the given key. Returns true if the key could be found, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        key - element to remove
        Returns:
        true if the element is deleted
        Throws:
        ValueException - if the key is not comparable to the root node
        java.lang.NullPointerException
